lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are unfortunately down one Laura Bailey tonight because she got the con plague from Chicago, and she needs a little baby to take care of, so she's going to be at home, watching and texting these guys if they do anything really wrong with Jester.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Please, just come.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We almost had three women at this table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Almost. But we have Ashley back. Back back for a while now. So happy you've returned.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, if you want to take it from here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, the best part about D&D Beyond is keeping track of your important stuff. And there's one important thing we keep losing: Ashley Johnson. Please put this on. So I'm proud to give you the first ever D&D Beyond Presents: The Mighty Nein Welcome Back Yasha Ceremony, featuring Ashley Johnson, everybody. Maestro, hit it. Oh, there's the award show music. I'm your host, D&D Beyond presents Sam Riegel, and we're going to go around the room super fast to honor Ashley's triumphant return. Didn't work. First up is Travis. None of them work. First up is Travis with a toast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When I drink to you, Ashley, my heart is as full as my glass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's enough! There's no time! We got to keep going! I can't do it! Do it for me! Now we're going to go to Taliesin with a song.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Should auld acquaintance be forgot, and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's enough! Marisha has a poem prepared!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Welcome back, Ashley, good friend of mine, goodbye Blindspot, hello Nein! (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And finally, Liam prepared an old Irish blessing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Irish accent) Oh may the road rise up to meet you. May the wind be always at your back. May the sun shine warm upon your face--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For every nat one rolled by us, D&D Beyond will be donating a hundred dollars-- Is that true?-- to 826LA! Also, D&D Beyond is retroactively donating for all the nat ones we've rolled so far in this campaign!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So many!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's like 4200 bucks! But there's more. Once we hit the 10,000 dollar donation tier level-- I don't really understand this part-- Critters will unlock a special discount code for the legendary bundle on D&D Beyond! (cheering) (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's totally not toxic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's in my drink!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: D&D Beyond!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone at Wyrmwood watching just cringed as we showered the table.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, Ashley, I'm going to tie it to your chair like we're at Applebee's.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Low, don't let them set the lights on fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I forgot to give you your award of excellence. It's from Jurassic World.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes! Oh, guys, come on, this is the best!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My Wyrmwood has never looked so festive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the most festive D&D game I've ever experienced.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't shoot my silly string, because it's hair spray.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were supposed to have a lighter too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, it's hairspray?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't even look at mine! That could have gone so poorly!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I bought the wrong thing at the store!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We almost had an actual Burning Hands example on script. Thank you, D&D Beyond, for helping with our wonderful push for 826. We'll have a video at the break today to show and explain some of the stuff involved with this whole charity push for 826, so look for that at the break.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man, I love you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So go pee, but watch it at the break, it's really important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A couple of things some of you may have noticed, but if you haven't--we have a fantastic partnership with Obsidian for the upcoming Pillars

lines.name: EII
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First time ever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's voicing Gilmore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go ahead and pre-order now at versusevil.com/criticalrole to pre-order the game if you want to check it out. I love the series and I'm super excited for the sequel, completely unbiased and then biased--hell yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Recording Vox Machina and Gilmore lines was sur-real!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the most surreal thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was so good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So crazy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Travis's might have been my favorite. It was fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 826LA did you make it all through everything there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did! It was kind of chaotic, but they're donating for natural ones, they are retroactively donating for natural ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you get to the matching the dollar amount?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no! Is that the 10k thing? I was confused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have new Twitch emotes available for being subscribers including some fun ones based on the new campaign! So we also have a

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spend ten, get nine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a Pike one, because we haven't established what Yasha's thing is yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's hard to show off eyeliner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A sliced-up corpse victim, maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's the absence of emoji.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll figure out who she is together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not moving it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've made a huge mistake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back. Last we left off, the Mighty Nein had gotten caught up with some interesting folks, the Knights of Requital, who had hoped to help shift the political balance in the city, remove the framing and forging of equipment, of materials and letters, some of the corrupt individuals of the local government. They had gone out into the evening, infiltrated a few of the homes and left this information behind, gotten in a few scuffles, leaving one of them, the High-Richter, dead, and shortly after there was an attack on the Tri-Spire. What are you looking at, Sam? God damn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it! You're in the clear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll remember this (laughs). Noticing there was seemingly an attack upon the Tri-Spire by two Xhorhasian assassin-type individuals, you met with one in the sewer trying to escape from being seen by the local guard during this confrontation and did battle with a Crick warrior of some kind. You subdued it, removed most of its equipment, and conflicted over this strange artifact, this beacon that it was carrying, sent it on its way; however, it was quickly caught by the guard and killed. You met, on the surface, the guard that were bringing the corpse and the object along, managed to spirit away the strange dodecahedron from the grasp of the town guard and absconded with it. You met with Dolan and Horris who're currently trying to figure out what to do in case they were somehow implicated with the events of the evening. You took Horris under your wing, promising Dolan that you would somehow smuggle him out of the city as it's currently on lockdown during this investigation. You all then managed to try and find some sort of lead on what the next step would be, went toward the Evening Nip apparently to seek possibly this individual known as The Gentlemen of which you have heard of previously as Kara, one of the members of the Knights of Requital, who had vanished seemingly had some sort of connection there. So you entered the Evening Nip, the rather dark and strange interior of the small dive bar, gave the previously discovered words, the code words that allowed you entry and were led down a long spiral staircase beneath the establishment into a subterranean bar. Upon which, after immediately stepping into the space, a black-furred female tabaxi approached Mollymauk over here and with a look of recognition said, "Lucien," and then embraced you. And that's where we left off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting) Fucking insight check on Taliesin! No, I'm kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys all watch this dark-furred tabaxi giving this big, strong hug around Mollymauk's shoulders. Pulls away and looks at you and goes, "It has been too long, two ye--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Far too long!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two years! (laughs) Look at you! You grew out your hair!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah yes, it's been quite an interesting two years.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you are covered in tattoos!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll catch up, we need a table, we need drinks for me and my compatriots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, you-- these are your friends now?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a long story and I can't tell you everything right now. You know how it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." As the tabaxi turns around, you can see there is posted right off to the right and around the corner a hulking figure that has leaned around the edge that leads into this L-shaped tavern. A hefty, muscular ogre that is wearing patchwork hide armor and holding a giant maul resting on the ground, looks back around the corner with these beady, dark eyes and large, looming jaw with angry broken teeth protruding from underneath going (snorts). Looks at the rest of you. Other folks around are looking a bit confused at your entry. Right immediately to your left is a table with a rough-and-tumble looking cutthroat sitting there eating a sandwich with a half-drunken drink, who's chewing slowly with this glare of mistrust in your direction. There are two balconies up above you in the chamber. You now get a better look up at the top, there are a number of individuals posted and some of them appear to be drinking, but there is at least one of them immediately in your view who has two skulking looking individuals with long dark cloaks and dark armor, carrying what looks almost like a heavy crossbow, but it's a long, metal rod. You've only seen them in use here and there, but these are some sort of a rifle-like firearm that are usually reserved for the armies and Bladegarden and to the far east of Xhorhas. A recently emerging technology that has been largely guarded within use of the empire itself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Literally everything coming back to haunt me. Okay, cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we had to ballpark it, how many persons would you say are in this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 or so people in this tavern, including the bartender, the individual who rushed to you as you entered, and various patrons around that you can get a quick bead on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The second she turns, I'm going to turn and give Fjord a little pat on the back and make a whisper really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make a whisper?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm gonna whisper in Fjord's ear-- I'm sorry, this is my nightmare, please just go with it? It's Lucien. And I'm back around. Pass it on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, which as soon as you say that, you back away and look right behind Fjord as you all are standing there. There's Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (nervous laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just at the bar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, right behind you as if she had just come down the stairs with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yasha!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shrieks)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey! So?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm apparently Lucien from two years ago. From two years ago. It's Lucien, remember? It's been ages!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, it's been a minute. Hey, you guys walked right past me in the bar upstairs so I decided to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are like a bad penny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did not walk right past you! We looked around! You're big, we would have seen you!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've been right behind you the whole time, I don't know how you didn't know I was here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so glad to see you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm glad to see you too, Mollymauk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Lucien. It's Lucien.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's Lucien!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's nothing private about our situation at all, right? There's people everywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there's people all throughout the tavern, but there's some music playing. There's two musicians that are in the process of plucking away at two instruments. Everyone seems further in the chamber, rather absorbed in their current rigmarole, but you guys have just stepped down the stairs. You haven't left the stairs. You are literally standing right at the entrance of this tavern and you've all been taken aback by that encounter, the realization that Yasha had followed you down the stairs, and whatever is about to transpire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll explain later, just go with it please?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Yasha followed us, she wasn't starting down here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gotcha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't mind rolling with this name Lucien, but does it bring any extra trouble with it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. We'll find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just go with it, I'll explain later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it all makes sense to you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll explain later!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This club is awesome!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to change my name in this club?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we all supposed to change our names?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should all come up with different names.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might be easier just to have them all killed right now-- I didn't say that out loud. I didn't say that out loud. I'm just thinking out loud, oh, god. It's going to be fine, I'm not panicking.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go get drinks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, a hand claps and the tabaxi is now at one of the tables and has shooed off one of the drinks and goes, "This way, I found a table for everyone."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come, sit down. I give the tabaxi another hug as we sit down. How have you been? It's been ages!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, too long. I apologize for using your old name. Nonagon, it is a pleasure to see you again."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a chance. I didn't catch that at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nonagon was what you heard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nonagon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the tabaxi, not the ogre?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the tabaxi said that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lucien Nonagon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically what was said was, "I'm sorry for saying your old name, Nonagon." Was correcting Lucien to Mollymauk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is Nonagon like a slang for-- or like a word for sorry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who can keep track these days? Again, a long story.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nonagon, what happened? We watched you die."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It may not have necessarily been my ass that you buried.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had a few tricks up my sleeve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Well, that spell-spitter lady from the capital. She said you were gone, she "took the book and left, and her contract said she was in the right and that we knew better than "to go toe to toe with her and her ilk."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously. Is everybody else all right? I know it has been a while. I had to stay underground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unfortunately, Jurrel met with the axe of the law shortly after you left us."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn shame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Zoran, Ottis, and Tyffial have all scattered amongst the empire..."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn shame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But, do you want me to find the others?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, actually I'm--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know where Tyffial is!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is Tyffial? I would rather obviously deliver everything in person. Honestly if I had known you were here I would've made arrangements. I didn't want to shock you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's up in Nogvurot. We can travel there, I can send a message and have her come down to us."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm working on something very delicate, I need everything to be very quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, Nonagon."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I apologize, I'm not very observant. I missed your name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where are my manners?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My apologies. My name is Cree."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am a member of the, well, the family around-- how much do they know?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know a lot!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We pretty much know all of it, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were told the name of the group that you traveled with, but I can't remember it now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They don't know a lot, but they're trustworthy. I've been putting my trust in them so far.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do, I know all of it, so you can just tell me if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's actually fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check, both of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm the worst. 13.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically advantage because it's kind of the truth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically? All right, sure, I'll give you that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got a ten, but technically I know-- I'm rolling at advantage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I think that's advantage. I begged for advantage on that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll give you that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we were all part of the same order at one point, and we splintered off. Luci-- Nonagon "had a different path in mind for us, so we went north to Shady Creek Run and we started the Tomb "Takers. It's just so good to see you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's good to be seen again. But again, it's got to be very quiet right now. It's been like three other names since the last time I saw you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I should inform the others."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please, keep it quiet for now. That book caused more trouble than you think, and it all laid on my shoulders. I was trying to protect the rest of you from some of the worst elements of that and I don't want any heat dropping on anybody who doesn't know what's coming yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But let me know where they are and I'll get a hold of them. But don't let them know why yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tabaxi curls in a little bit, leans over the table towards you with this big grin and says, "Does this mean that it worked?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) That's, again, mixed company and public company.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you can tell us about the ritual! Ritual?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a look of recognition.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it was successful! Remind me what it was again? There's been so many rituals lately!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mixed results.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were mentioning this group, the Tomb Takers. You had another name before. Were you a group and our friend joined you at some point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, he led us away from the original order. They were a bit... clouded. We had a new path."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what was the name of the original order you were a part of?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not the Tomb Takers, that was the splinter group, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The one that came before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a few looks now of-- the euphoria is washing away from the face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't have to tell them anything you don't want to tell them, that's all right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Was he your new path?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He brought us onto a new path, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was your unifying trait or pursuit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Foolishness in thinking I knew what I was doing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is not a good answer!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the answer you're getting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is all well and good and kind of fucking boring. I couldn't help but notice that surly-looking crew up there, who might that be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you see standing, arms crossed, a very muscular-looking goliath female with a very short leather strap top, shaved sides of the head in a tuft of a mohawk that curls down into a long ponytail that goes down the back, who's glaring in your direction. Sitting beside this burly-looking goliath you see a high-backed chair with a red velvet matte. Sitting feet crossed up on the table in a nice, long deep-blue coat, leather-gloved hands, light teal skin, jet-black hair that's long, just past the shoulders, a widow's peak in the center, a bit of a dark goatee, male figure standing there, hands entwined and crossed, looking at you from across the way with a curious grin. "The Gentleman."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You work for The Gentleman these days?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We had to find work, we didn't know if you were ever coming back. We thought-- so we had to "move on. We knew you'd eventually return, I just did not know how long and we had to make ends meet."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How is it, working for The Gentleman?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please, come before me. Present yourselves! I "want to know who has graced us with their majestic presence. Come, come." The finger goes up and you watch as everyone holding the rifles cock them and point down at you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord, say something!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking at our friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cree goes--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'll saunter over with my drink and sit down at the table. Come on everyone, let's do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you all go and sit? There's a long bench there on the opposite side of this table where you can either stand or sit, since there's quite a few of you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll stand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester is like, "I don't know what's going on." Sorry, Laura. I don't know what the fuck Jester would do. Jester is the most random character.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's going Homer Simpson, running circles around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's giving out leaflets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will also stand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys approach you hear this (wheezing laughter). There's the second balcony that was facing in the direction where you entered. As you look up you can see there's another rifleman standing, and hanging by one arm off the side, you see this crazed-looking young gnome with this big mound of curly hair and this big chinstrap beard who's just dangling going (wheezing laughter), looking over you all from a distance really creepily. The ogre's there still, hand on the maul. "So. Introductions, please! I think I have an idea who you are, but I want to hear it from "your mouths. Please, tell me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Humbly, we are members of The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I knew it, I knew it! (laughs) Oh, this is a gracious day. Very well. Welcome to the real "Evening Nip. Pleasure to have you, each and every one of you. I've seen you around upstairs, "wandering and skulking a bit. I didn't know you were part of this mighty troupe."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I hang out with them, but I actually like the drinks here a lot, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so. What brings such esteemed "adventurers to my pocket of the underworld?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we sought an audience, and to be frank, we thought we might find a little bit more of a warm reception than the one that we're currently getting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! I'm sorry." They pull the rifles off you. "Habit. Safety, you understand."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh of course, easily understood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. You have my audience."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We mean to make ourselves of service, whether it be for the good of the city or other endeavors. We're new here. We thought we would try to make as many introductions and have as many meetings happen as we could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Interesting. I have one question, before we get too deep in this conversation. How did you "find your way in here?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a bit of an enthusiast of the underworld. So I came across some information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go on."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Demedan got his order of bloodroot. It was really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Demedan gave you this information?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Demedan was clumsy with his information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Equally dangerous, good to know. Remember that." The goliath cracks knuckles. "All right, "so. Interesting. Now you know the way in. That's dangerous, as we've just made acquaintances and "you now know the direct path into my domain. So to make this a comfortable conversation and possibly "an arrangement going forward that we can all agree upon, I have one small request."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure we'd be all ears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cree! Please." The tabaxi who was in the back goes, "Yes, of course." Steps over to the side of the bar and picks up a small leather satchel, puts it over her shoulder, walks up behind the table, opens it, and pulls out an alchemist rack of a bunch of corked vials, like small vials, opens it, and says, "I need, just-- and bear with me, please-- just a small bit of "your blood. The reasoning being, if I can't trust you, and you can't trust me, how am I to know you "aren't going to turn me in immediately outside to the King's Hall? And I need some means in case you "just abscond with this information: perhaps make an arrangement with me and then leave town. I need "to find you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This would be used to locate us? Is that what this is for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that is Cree's speciality.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is definitely Cree's speciality.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull your hand out, Cree does a flick of the finger, and you watch as the blood trails off on its own like a small serpent of mercury and just (flowing). For a second, even though it was a small wound, it's bleeding quite a bit and you're like, "Uh." It makes you a little uncomfortable and then all of a sudden the blood flow stops. The vial is filled about an inch full, then she caps it. "Thank you so much."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a gift that I learned the same place where the Nonagon's gifts were found."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lucien, at the table, is fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lucien."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Next."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I trust you with this. Don't get fancy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same thing. Fills the next vial, a strange, almost an arc of crimson finds its way and fills a secondary tube. There's like twelve tubes there, but she'll fill as many as needed for this one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Don't like it, do you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I borrow a tusk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester goes, "Me too, me too!" Feeling left out in the moment, gives her blood as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, are we doing this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No harm will come to you, unless you bring harm to me. So this is just a precautionary "measure. I appreciate your trust."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three to go? One, two, three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, your blood is taken into a vial.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll follow suit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your blood is also taken into a vial.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (hisses)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough to do! (spurting)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fair enough. I take my finger and I run it across my blade as I stare at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fantastic, I really appreciate that." You're getting a closer look now, of The Gentleman. The teal skin tone-- it's interesting. It looks almost like he's perpetually sweating. There's moisture on the outskirts of his skin at all times. There's the faint hint of, whether it be condensation from the air around or produced internally, there's a general sense of dampness to the skin of this figure. "So an arrangement, you say. First off, "just because it's fun for me, are you believers in luck?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I'd say I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That destiny is looking out for you? I've seen enough in my time and have lived in spite of "it all because something wants me here. Would you consider yourselves lucky?"

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Then let's gamble."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then let's gamble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you writing that down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's gamble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I want to know how lucky my investments are. Gambit of Ord? Who wishes to face me in this? "Who feels the luckiest of your band?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. Where's the fucking luck of Jester?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. She's at home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I watched her play last time, I could do-- I don't-- (stutters)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you do it? I'll just drink-- I need just a little loosener.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I feel lucky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I win, you're mine. If you win, then we can do business."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So what's your name?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fjord. Let us deal." Did you put 50 gold on the table?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Now I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was nothing fishy in the card shuffle, in the cut, was there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, get 'em!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do it. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seemed to be above board.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye on the deal as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The first cards are dealt out for the first round. This is Gambit of Ord. This is different from The Crick-Queen's Call. This is a Marquesian card game. Roll a d8, but keep it hidden to yourself. All right. "So now, I'm going to go ahead and raise another 50 gold." (clinking) Onto the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My goodness, this is getting expensive quite fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we deal with quite a large amount of business."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yawning) 50 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you put another 50 gold?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll a d6, and keep that secret alongside that die. "Do you wish to raise?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I raised first last time. I'm offering you the chance to raise if you'd like."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Funny how that works. No, I'm good where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Interesting. I'll raise another 50 gold."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounds good. 50 it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d4. He's holding his cards in his hand, looks across at you, looks all throughout the room. "Well, Fjord, looks like it's time to call."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, we're not going to bet again? (silence)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Puts another 100 gold on the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's make it 150.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Very well."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (mutters) That's all the money I have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we seen anything suspicious from the deals, or the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Jester) Jester wants you to know that from home she is watching The Gentleman and making sure he is not cheating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check for Jester, and you make an insight check as well, since you were both keeping a close eye on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, she rolled really well. What's her modifier, added to an 18?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22? Actually, there has been no weirdness with the cards. This is a straight test of luck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Jester) Oh, this man has the Luck feat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you don't see anything, nothing that catches you off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I rolled less than Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, we're now at a pot of 150 times two, 50 times two, so 600 gold, I believe, right? 50, 50, 50, and the 150.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) So 500.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you start with 50, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We started with 50, and then we raised 50, and then raised 50, so that was 150. So it's 600 on the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can do math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 300 from each of them. "All right." He presents the dice that he had rolled, or the cards that he had found, which is a five, a four, and a one. A grand total of ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, come on, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you reveal the cards there's a (gasp). A gasp in the room and The Gentleman, his muscles tense for a second and he goes, (laughs) "Well-played and well earned! Take the coin, it's yours."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. Nice hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to know that we have luck on your side as well. That's very important to me with people I "do business with. So (clears throat) you have some balls throwing down that change and going into a "game with me, I like that. So what can our many gifts and my associates present to you? What are "your strengths? What are your skills? I've heard you've done some deeds. I've heard you killed some "terrible creature in the sewers, is that correct?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did. Yes. We fought and killed a giant spider of sorts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And one of our compatriots--" and he points up to one of the balconies on the side, and you can see, behind the individual that had the rifle, you see Kara, the half-elf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I was going to ask for her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And says, "One of our compatriots has kept us up "to speed about your infiltrations. I have to say, I'm impressed."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not too bad."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Balanced.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good skill set.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: High profile, but low profile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps not the most legal. Things that are restricted by the empire. That means our skills "are best through speed, subterfuge, darkness. We don't have the best, aside for muscle besides "from, well (laughs) I do keep Sorah by my side, just in case."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that the goliath?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is the goliath he refers to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Que Sorah, Sorah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait the goliath or the ogre?

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: The goliath.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The mohawk lady.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're very strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very good."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As you can see, Yasha is very strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you've caused enough chaos in the Tri-Spire. You brought down one of the more "corrupt, though strangely uncorruptible from our end, politicians we've seen. And from what I hear, "Lord Sutan is already in chains." (chuckles)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We had nothing to do with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, I think--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's quick to toe the party line.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Particularly a purple-skinned tiefling who was spotted not far from the home that night, with "rather ostentatious clothing. As well as a wandering dark-skinned youth, a woman with "physical capability. So that doesn't bode well for you, does it?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sucks being in the wrong place at the wrong time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, as seeing as how we're friends now, I can say that I could probably make this "investigation go away."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this an investigation that you caused to begin with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "No, this is an investigation that you caused."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doing your bidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Through one of your associates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My associate was making sure that the events would transpire in our favor. But "nevertheless, we were not the orchestrators of The Knights of Requital."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's assume this is not a gift you are offering, what is it that you are looking for in return?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But I deal in trade mostly. So I would like a "favor in kind." He leans forwards a bit, and you can see some of the condensation slowly dripping down the side of the face. Making a few spots on the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll offer him a napkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you hold a napkin out, the eyes catch you for a second. The head turns, confused for a second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Great thought, not now. Good thought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He seems like he needs--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (shushing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's schvitzing. I mean it's not even humid in here. (whispering) He's got a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "About a mile out of the underworks, beneath the city. Down the underground river pass that our "shipments to the Ounterloch and Berleben pass through, one of my men noticed a strange wall "uncovered by time. We sent a team of our best infiltrators to see what this was about. Within, a "purple light, and the promise of ancient spoils seemed to peek from within. Some sort of abandoned "research facility from ages past. Well my curiosity got the better of me. So we sent the "team inward to seek it out. But amongst these few gold-laden objects that enticed my men-- they are "a superstitious lot-- and upon being beset by series of phantom globes they fled and collapsed "the entrance behind them." You see him glare past you and hear the shifting of a few pieces of armor as three individuals avert their gaze. (sighs) "So those fucks have failed. I would like you to "return to that site for me. Find a way in. Inquire within. Seek and seeing as how you are so good at "eliminating monstrous beasts, clearing the space of any dangers, hostile creatures. Return with any "of your findings. Do this for me and I will see that the scent is thrown off you permanently. I'll "even let you keep some of the spoils."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'd like to know what they saw before, what we might expect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. By all means. Do we have a deal?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To clear our name here in Zadash?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we know that you can clear our name? We've proven to you that we're lucky. You know our reputation. We don't know anything about you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's say I've lived and worked a solid 15 years orchestrating the seedy underbelly of this "entire city. I've never been caught, I've never been arrested, and I thrive on a pile of gold and "riches you can only begin to imagine."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm beginning to imagine it right now, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is certainly one to grow on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not good enough. That's a twelve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, he's a shifty individual being by nature. But it's hard to get a sense of whether or not he would be trying to lie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. He's sweating, he must be nervous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I may, we passed a test for you. Would you pass one for us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That says a lot about you. Yes, please tell me, "what would this trial be, you would ask of The Gentleman?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I have three of those vials? Just the empty ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cree." Fumbles in the pouch and brings out three of the empty glass vials, and hands them over to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I were to fill two of these vials with ordinary alcohol and one with something else, would you be able to tell which is which? With your discerning eye and your years of experience?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm. Certainly, I feel confident."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take the Pepsi challenge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they reasonably the same colorish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reasonably. I'd say the alcohol is a bit more brackish. The acid itself is a little more translucent, but you could possibly add a little bit of alcohol to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll take a little splash of alcohol and some darker stuff and mix it around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're an alchemist, you've dealt with varying chemicals. So I'd say, given a moment, you could go ahead and match it fairly close, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, this one is the acid; these two are booze. And now I will try to (rapid movement)--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doesn't actually switch hands, you just do this a lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never mess with a goblin when death is on the line!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check versus his perception.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to kill The Gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 total?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you present the vials.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you die, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "This one is alcohol. This one is alcohol. This one is acid." And takes the acid from your grasp and uncorks it and drinks it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh shit, that's baller!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll the damage for your acid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some Inigo Montoya shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what to roll. It's 1d6 or something. What do I-- I got to look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should be on your break down of your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's here. Acid vial.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have it here actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, roll 2d6.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is so baller. Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. All right, so he (slight cough) (grunts) downs it, but it doesn't seem to have as much of an effect on him. It looks like it hurt, and he takes it. The muscles tense a bit, the face twitches as it goes down and it burns. But then he takes the vial and corks it again, rolls it across the table. (coughs) "Does that satisfy your inquiry?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gulp) (gulp) Yep, yeah, that's good. That was impressive. I mean, you pass the test, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "Good, good. I like it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will say the only thing that I can think of that I would want, not even necessarily addend to this contract, if we are going to do this to you; I'm looking to stay on the down low in general. If we can agree, even my presence in this city necessarily is, as far as it's concerned, is none of anybody's concern outside this bar. I would be forever grateful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We deal well in secrecy, my friend."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured you would.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lucien, was it?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sometimes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "Very well."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sir, I couldn't help but hear that this is about a mile outside of the city. Is that correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Correct."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you operating on any sort of a timeline? Might we have a little bit of lenience with how quickly we get this dealt with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The sooner the better, because we can begin opening that line. We've now two weeks and three "shipments lost."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've just had a thought, actually, if you could help us at the same time, we're trying to get a friend of ours out of the city. And (coughs) recent events seem to have clogged up most entries and exits. We have a friend, Horris, that needs to find his way to a safe spot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kara knows him, real well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, this would be Dolan's partner, yes?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Discretion is appreciated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We specialize in discretion and specialize in smuggling. And specialize in people."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Figured you might.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you do this deed, we'll consider it part of your gift."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outstanding. I think we have a deal, do we not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I find all of this very agreeable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good, very good, quiet one. Now we have access to the tunnels. Of course we'll have to "blindfold you to bring you through the underworks to the tunnel that leads to this underground "river, when you decide to leave. Just because there's a lot of secrets down here, and we're "still building our trust. But come back in whenever you're ready. We'll be happy to escort "you and send you on your way."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outstanding.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How long do you keep our blood for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, as long as we have our arrangements."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But we get it back when we're done? Or we decide not to work with you anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you've proven yourself trustworthy enough, in the long term, perhaps. But understand "that this is just a precaution. Who's to know? Perhaps things go sour in a few months. I want to "make sure you don't double cross me and send the guard down."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look like he's speaking from experience? He's a little twitchy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (grumbling) 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more that he's lived this long by being careful. And when a bunch of strangers find this secret pass into his lair, he wants to be damn well sure that he knows where to find you if need be.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember, the name Lucien doesn't leave this bar. Outside, I never want to hear it uttered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know who any of you are outside this bar."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Brilliant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't worry. Anyway," and he throws his feet back up on the table . "Drinks are on me, "until you make your leave."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fantastic! Nott, pace yourself now, you hear?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (growling) (nervous humming)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quality, not quantity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that goliath wielding any sort of visible weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, it does not appear there's a weapon immediately on the goliath, but as you look behind, in the corner right behind the chair where The Gentleman sits, there looks to be one hefty-ass maul. A giant chunk of solid metal with a long handle on it that is resting against the stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ogre and the goliath mauls each. Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They like to break things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who were the two guys that said that they passed out trying to get away from the creepy, ancient facility?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, they were armored behind us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Underneath the balcony, right next to where the ogre is posting watch in the center of the tavern, the three of them are sitting off to the side, looking uncomfortable. They were sitting earlier, and since all of this happened they stood to attention and haven't found a comfortable moment to sit down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just shifty, rogue-y underbelly types?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You look over and you see two of them appear to be human. Relatively young, probably mid to late 20s. Scruffy-looking. One of them has a darker, fro-y hair that's unkempt and covering part of his face. The other one has very short cut hair, dark complexion, brown red. They're both wearing darker leathers and cloaks that are thrown over one shoulder. They're holding tankards in their hand and they're both talking amongst each other while keeping an eye on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That group looks like your type. Feel like making friends?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My favorite pastime.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The third one appears to be a halfling female who is sitting in a corner, quietly sipping out of the tankard and looking nervously around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Want to accompany me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would love to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the two of you approaching?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. Anyone else wants to join.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking a long look at Cree and I want to see if I see any of the things that I expect to see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you expect to see there, T?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know. Dander.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to see if there's any markings or anything otherwise that I would expect to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are you locking your iPad between every move?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because it's better that way. Perception check. Wow, that's a terrible roll. That's a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A fur-covered tabaxi, it's hard to make any details out beyond the fur, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you approach the corner. Kara is watching you as you step past, and steps back on the balcony, out of sight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give her a little (clicks tongue) when I walk by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deal with that later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach the two gentlemen and the female halfling, they just watch you. They don't engage you verbally at all, they just keep an eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab one of the half-drinken beers from someone else's table and set it down and be like, here you go. I got this for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it. The guy with the larger curly hair takes it and pours it into his own and sets it back down. "Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Heard you guys got all heebie jeebie and passed out in your last little mission.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well--" and the other guy elbows him and he's like, (whispering) "Shut up!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's cool! We're here to clean up y'all's shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We got up the river from there. We got our boats "and made our way back."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me get this straight. A bunch of fucking floating lights came out of the wall, gave your boy a little static shock, and you ran?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look at each other and look at the halfling. The halfling's like, "I wasn't going to "stay behind!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Well, they're calling in the big leaguers now, so we'll take it from here. Your way up and down those stairs you mentioned, you get tripped up along the way, or was it just easy sailing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any traps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We didn't go into the bottom chamber. That looked ominous enough. We stuck to the top one."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about it was ominous?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Had this faint purple-ish glow on the inside-- "

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you afraid of geometry? I don't--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Scared of school.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Old terrors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, you can come by and sass me all you fucking want. I've been here for two years. You "newcomers walk in here and think you're all tough shit! You think it's so great? Go! Go in there! "Come back!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trying to throw it in the garbage, but it hit your balloon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I saw the whole--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still a game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You think you're tough shit? You go take care of it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You see that really tall woman over there with that big greatsword on her back? She doesn't appreciate when people talk to us like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I see him point at me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Flex.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, 15. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. He's looking over at you. You can see him swallowing hard.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I put my hand on my hilt and I pull it out a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like you guys are much more well-equipped "for this shit than we are. Look, I'm not saying we're better than you. We're better at some "things. You're better at others. That's why they're sending you in, because we can't fight "fucking ghosts. You go for it!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fun. The whole time this was happening, I was rubbing my feet against the ground, building up a static shock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, rubbing against Fjord. Like this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My shag armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just waiting for it. All right, thank you so much, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, good. (laughter) Sorry, can't help it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you three have a name?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Mighty

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't be ashamed if you don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guy who's talking to you says, "That's Hannah there. I'm Louis." He pauses for a moment, shakes your hand. "Now go get this thing."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Enjoy your drinks. Going to join the others.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yasha. Do I deal with this or do I not deal with this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think you should deal with this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't want to deal with this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does any of this sound familiar to you from the past?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate this. I'm going to stand up, and walk over to Cree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Cree is still standing by the bar with the satchel on. As you stand up and start approaching, she smiles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lifetime ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed. I can tell you it's so good to see you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a weird question, and I apologize for it. The spell I used to get away, it-- I wasn't there for as long as you thought I was. I missed how everything ended in the end. I hate to ask, but I was long gone before anything really started to go down. How did everything end? Can you just-- I'll explain why in a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell slinger from the capital. She came and "oversaw and performed the ritual for you. I don't trust those folk, but I trust you, and if you "trusted, than that was enough for me. You gave us a speech. We had a fine meal. We all got ready "there in the forest."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's where I lost you, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sun rose, and nothing. So, as you told us, if "anything were to go wrong, we had to get rid of any sign, any trace. So, not far from the Tomb "Taker hideout, we buried you and we went our separate ways. She took the tome, the mage woman, "it was part of the arrangement you had with her."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to have to find her again at some point. The reason I've stayed quiet-- It was never going to work. Somebody was working against me. I don't know who, but I can't trust anyone. I saw how you reacted to seeing me and it was-- I'm willing to believe it wasn't you who turned. But it could have been her, but it could have been one of us. That's why I need you to keep it quiet. Please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check. You're starting to get in deep into this now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deception check?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I wander over and see if I can overhear anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start wandering over, but there's too much noise and general din in the chamber around you to make anything out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There will come a moment when I can tell you everything, but... It's so complicated. Please just keep it quiet for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until I know that everyone's going to react the way that you did to seeing me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, of course, Lucien."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will tell you everything eventually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please, please do."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I give a hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a moment pause, and then Cree takes in the hug too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been too long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a faint purr in the ear, and then you hear the voice whisper, "It's good to see you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry for everything. And I give the pat, and head back to the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me too." As you walk away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While that conversation happens. Can I speak to you? Just for a second?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was a princely sum you just wagered with there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Good thing I won, huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it is. That wouldn't have, by any chance, have been recompense for everything we did the other night? Or are you rolling in it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I rolling in it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm wondering if you just wagered the party's funds. On a very calculated risk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. No, I was actually only gambling

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you come with funds on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know, I would be all right if you had? I am a fan of calculated risks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. But it was just, you know-- You're flush. I understand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm telling the truth. I hadn't even divvied up that amount from Dolan and everybody else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Seems forthright.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good to know. Calculated risks. I'll keep that in mind. I thought you liked to play things close to the chest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If the reward is good and it's not stupid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sometimes you got to get a little stupid, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk over with a new round of drinks. Here, drink this. I'm told they're stupid. Ugh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Molly, you have-- Sorry, Lucien.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's not it either.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, Non--Nongatek.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lucien for the moment. We'll talk about it later.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Would you like us to call you Lucien or do you want us to call you Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In here, we're Lucien.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many names are there? Is it over ten or under?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's have that conversation somewhere else. I don't know who's listening here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She seemed real into you, but not in an into you like "I want to tap that" kind of into you, but in an "I've watched you walk on water" type of into you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that was a weird amount of into you, wasn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you change that alcohol into wine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cut my finger a bit and bleed into it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With one of your long fingernails?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit. You know, to a dumbass, that actually is convincing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's alcohol one way or the other. I'll fucking drink.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it wine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's bloody water. It's water with a hint of iron aftertaste.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Worth a try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Write what you know, Taliesin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly-- Excuse me, Lucien.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nantucket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many others around here might we expect to have that same reaction towards you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will have this conversation outside this bar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is basically Taliesin at Ren Faire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Lord Taliesin!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin, there's tabaxis coming out of every stall. What the hell, man?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lucien's not going to answer any questions. Molly will answer every question you have later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you're not going to answer any questions, can we please direct some to Yasha over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for coming back, I've missed you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where were you? Where'd you go? Why did you leave?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sometimes I have things to do, I barely know you guys, so sorry if I leave!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why do you need to know so many things?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not afraid of inclement weather or anything, are you? It'd been real fair, that storm rolled in, and poof, you were fucking gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She left us before we were ambushed in Alfield, and when she left us this time, we almost died in this plot to overthrow the empire, or whatever it was with Crick soldiers. Maybe it's related!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Pretty shit luck for you, then. That has nothing to do with me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I respect a woman who can handle her business on her own personal time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sometimes I need to leave. Plus, I barely know you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're not used to you yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is true. Do you think you will be able to travel with us for a little while, perhaps?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, get to know us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could use a hand for a bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd owe you one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you handle what you needed to handle?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I did. I think I'm looking for answers for something, and I don't know if I received any more, but I'm still looking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you told us what it was, we could help you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know if you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No pressure, at all, but it is nice to have some muscle around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lots of pressure! Maximum amount of pressure!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you, Nott. I'll stick around and offer my strength as much as I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She is just joshing you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am not!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She is definitely not joshing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look around this unsavory place? There are no faces that I recognize, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing around, no. Other than Kara, who you had spoken with previously, nobody else catches your attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is she doing right now? She still watching us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she's not watching you. She's receded into the top balcony into a chamber behind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It seemed like the Gentleman-- who's very impressive, by the way-- knows a lot about stuff, including the fact that we were involved in a plot to frame the Sutan fellow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He knows Kara pretty well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think he would know if the Xhorhas invasion at the same time as our little plan was a bigger conspiracy? Were we set up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would we be set up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, but it seems coinky-dinky that we were there on a night when towers were exploding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we should talk to Kara. I've been playing hard to get, waiting to see if she mingles around to us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're so coy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think Kara's the way to go. We start asking him questions about something that big, maybe he won't like us poking our nose around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll check, but shit happens, and you've got to be doing something when shit happens. We just happened to be doing something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When shit happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's hardly a coincidence.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You guys are going to Xhorhas?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. There was a bit of a beatdown the other night in the Tri-Spire. One of the towers was attacked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah. When did you get in town?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I saw that.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: You were here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was here. I've been here the whole time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What were you up to?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was trying to figure some shit out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was it?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What we commonly referred to in the circus as "Yasha-ing."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Yasha-ing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I like to get away from things sometimes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have been getting our hands dirty, a little bit. Are you sure you want to get your hands dirty with us?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's all I'd like to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's direct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a sight to behold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to go talk to Kara before we get out of here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what was the Xhorhas bit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Xhorhas assassins tried to steal a box of some sort that was a weapon of mass destruction or a portal to another dimension or some sort of fount of energy that powers their race, we have no idea, but they stole it, we encountered them in the sewers, we did not kill the Xhorhas assassin, but he was killed shortly thereafter and we stole his magical dodecahedron.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You said that in this bar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Jester) Technically we stole it from the crownsguard because he took it away, so we stole it later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not say anything in here that we wouldn't want to be circulated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All you need to know is the people from Xhorhas are dead now. Do you know people from Xhorhas?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm from Xhorhas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, is that a beer?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Probably not where they were from.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a Cr-- Can I say Crick? Is that okay? Do I have to be a Crick to say it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's not a Crick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Depends on who you're talking to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think I'm where they're from. I'm more southern parts of Xhorhas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're from that part of the world?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I don't know exactly where they were from. I don't know who they are, I don't know anything about them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They came in trying to steal this Beacon, this glowing beacon, which we still have, but they were mighty upset about it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long have you been in the Empire?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Make sure that's correct, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't know if you were born there or grew up there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long have you been here in the Empire?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: For about-- I don't know, when did I meet you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, was it a year and a half ago?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Year and a half.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give or take. How many people are listening in on this clearly right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm doing a scan, see if there's any wandering eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 14. Actually, no, 17, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. As is the nature of a seedy underbelly, there are a lot of individuals who are very interested in the newcomers that waltzed in, made a deal with their boss, and have sat and had a drink and are talking all sorts of business. There are a number of folks that are slowly creeping in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we please stop talking in here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean, people are listening to heavy metal GWAR babe, purple guy, and little green girl in a doll mask?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's retire for the evening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't we need to talk to Kara?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can come back and do this tomorrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! She's right here today!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You talk to Kara, then, but no more whatever this is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why, Lucien? You afraid the Myriad will hear? What's his reaction?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He definitely had a thing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am genuinely a little drunk, and didn't remember who the Myriad were.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I believe him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. 11.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What am I doing, deception? Ten. So I have to tell the truth? I have no idea, I'd literally forgotten because I'm a little drunk and I'm really preoccupied right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to roll deception if you're not lying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, I was just doing it to fuck with them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to have Frumpkin jump into Nott's lap and do the (gnawing) on her fingers to keep her occupied.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! I'll eat you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (angry meowing)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We go talk to Kara.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know Lucien, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go through a door, and there is a switchback stairway that leads to the upper balcony area, and as you head up there, it looks like there's a weapon rack which has a bunch of weapons set up. Kara's currently sitting on the edge of a bench and is sharpening the blades, small daggers and stuff, and looks back. "Oh! Hello." Sets it aside. "Look, I'm sorry, I didn't "mean to deceive anyone, but that's my business."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you were deceiving us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was keeping some things close to my chest, like I'm sure you do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that saying? Be careful of the toes you step on, they might belong to the ass you got to kiss later?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good one. Have to remember that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, I deceived no one, outside of what you needed to know. We got our business done. I've "done nothing wrong."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much of this was orchestrated from the beginning? Were we a distraction for the bigger picture?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you mean?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The attack on the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, the Crick attack on the tower? No, had nothing to do with us. We're not going to work "with those savage beasts."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was looking at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bring it to me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Still need a whisper corner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Ashley, Ashley's back, Ashley's back in the game, she's back in the game and she's never going back and Blindspot is no more. Well, maybe it is, we're just not sure, we're waiting to find out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) We're waiting to find out, but I'll be here for a minute now. Back to the game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That wasn't planned by anyone. If anything, it might have saved our asses, because it made "what you did small potatoes by comparison. I'm thankful it happened, but look, those things "continue to attack us from the eastern border, and from what little information's coming through, "it's getting worse with each passing week, so the last thing I want to do is let any more of them "into our backyard."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. You won't want to frame them in any type of larger scheme, considering it seems like you're quite irritated with them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, I know my limits. I'm not some mastermind. I want to make some coin, I want to "work with one of my skill sets, make the boss happy. I stay mainly within the city. I don't want "to deal with any bigger stuff than that. I'm just a girl."

lines.name: TRAVIS
