lines.text: Throwing a dagger just seems so inelegant to me. I don't know why. They're meant to cut food and to eat food with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean no offense to any of you here, but I got to get right back to work. Looks like one of my me's is available to help you for the rest of this--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I understand. If she changes her mind, we'll let you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, no, well, let them know. Thank you so much. Have a wonderful day. It's a pleasure to see you again. You too."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nice to meet you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's bigger than you are. He goes into the back and goes right back to work and you hear another foot hit the pan. "Ah, I need to-- aw man."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How high are the ceilings in this store?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ceiling's probably about ten-foot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I low how your voice went (low voice) to (imitating Matt) "The ceiling's about--" Okay. Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi. Sorry about that. I was helping a customer, but he's left now. Not purchasing anything. So I'm happy to help you. What can I do for you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're pretty well taken care of at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got everything we need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All righty. Well, have a wonderful day and come by whenever you like, big spender. I saw that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is my flask coming along all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Coming along fine. I think that's part of what Pumat's working on right now."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Add any sort of shiny finish to it or some extra flair or baubles to it, that would be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll see what we can do. Thank you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Thank

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We leave. Unique, huh?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a-- I've never seen any-- I thought they were related and then they all have the same name so I guess that's another thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You're quite the word wizard with the haggling there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Listen. I realize I'm not great with people. Just no need to point it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was being honest. You actually got money off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. I forgot about that. Yes, I did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, nice job.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never seen you blush before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She is quite pale. It's hard to tell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, what do we need--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She doesn't like the spotlight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Attention's a bitch, isn't it?

lines.name: ASHLEY, LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nein.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should probably go to the blacksmith at some point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easily enough at the blacksmith, for the sake of brevity here. Yeah, you can pick up--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A thousand throwing stars.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, for ten gold. Just ball bearings and throwing stars.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say there are darts and there are, we'll say throwing stars. Sure, why not? Because of the Archive's nearby, there probably would be a use for them. They're not often called for. It's probably a surprise that somebody wanted to purchase them, but they have about 20, we'll say, throwing stars, which act as darts, for five copper a piece.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hand Yasha one of the ten gold that Beau gave me. This is Beau's money, so I think she'd want you to purchase them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, she gave you the money.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but she doesn't like me very much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well maybe that will make her like you more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's doubtful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why do you think that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why do I think it's doubtful she will like me? She has threatened me constantly. She is very aggressive. She's very surly. She doesn't smile a lot unless there is a spell cast on her. I've only seen her punch people in the face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has she punched you in the face yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give her time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think she likes you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The only reason I might disagree is because she did give you money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take that money. It'll be no problem.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give one gold to Yasha and I hold on to the other nine.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Nein

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are you going to do with the rest of the money?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to give it back to her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can, to be fair, get all 20 of those throwing darts for one gold.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're triangular in shape and bladed at the edges. Pretty light.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I test one out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Go ahead and roll a d20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nope. Seven. No, sorry. Nine.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Nein

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You throw it towards this post and it (whoosh). (whinnies) This horse all of a sudden bucks and kicks the side of the stable nearby and you hear the wood crack from the kick. All of the sudden you hear voices of the two stable hands trying to hold back this horse. So it's 19 throwing stars.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck, sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was worth it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Admittedly, I'm not good at throwing things, but it looked really cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we bring Horris with us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm watching him. While you guys are doing this, I'm like: Check under your bed. Did you leave anything behind? Go pee. One last time, man. Come on, come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too real for me, too real.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Camp counselor Beau. Incredible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, Molly, and Jester, actually, as you guys are walking back, you notice that there are now clusters of about three or four crownsguard at different places that are in the process of asking questions to people, going from place to place and inquiring.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to turn around and immediately head towards the other bar. The Evening Nip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester's not with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, she's not with you. You're right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to let you know. Tell them I'm hiding at the bar and I'll meet them there when it's time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We see guards asking around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, like talking to people, asking questions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I am just going to pull my cloak up and put the hood up. That's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys make your way back to The Leaky Tap. There, what little Horris had on him, a little bit of change and materials to leave, is ready to go. Beau and Jester are propped and ready as well, I assume? What do you guys do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go on our mission or should we get rid of Horris?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we're dropping him off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Horris is part of the mission.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah we'll be dropping him off at The Evening Nip.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should go. Let's make hay while the sun shines.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Drop off Horris and then go. Do we know where we're going for this mission?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A mile out of town.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Evening Nip, and then they're going to escort us out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be blinded.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Beau, Caleb got these for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) Perfect! Thank you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There were 20, but one of them fell out of the bag.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, they were so heavy and I am so weak that I gave them to Yasha to carry. Here's your change.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. Why are you acting so weird about this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just weird in general.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks for the change. Thank you, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: One of them's missing, but I think it fell out of the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was an accident. There was nothing suspicious about it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it fell out of the bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should go. Okay. Horris, we're going to try and get you out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Thank you. Thank you. Whatever you need."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a Liam thing, not a Caleb thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to say, right now, where we are, Frumpkin, I'm telling him to follow us all, about 55 to 60 feet back behind us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Easy enough. All right. As you guys make your way towards The Evening Nip, Horris is looking a bit nervous, but does look around and seems genuinely very thankful. He's like, "Seriously, this means a lot. To both me and Dolan. Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're welcome. And then I put a bag over his head and I say sorry, sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that can probably wait until we are at The Evening Nip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he can't see where we're going, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure he can. We just don't want crownsguard thinking we're walking around a hooded person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I figured we're-- All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably hold on that until we get-- We'll say, for the purposes of this, you're pretty close to The Evening Nip when you do this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. We made it. Now's the time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay. Now over his head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 6:00am, wake up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're just pushing around a guy with a bag on his head. Hey! Nah, it's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's had too much to drink?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going through a Jake Gyllenhaal phase.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high pitched) His eyes are dilated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Happy Halloween!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys enter The Evening Nip. Clive is there at the end. "Hey. You're a friend with a bag?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We made arrangements with The Gentleman downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." (grunts) He leads you to the back, shoves things off of the latch, pulls up the trapdoor, down the stairs, and you eventually make your way back into the tavern below, where Mollymauk is waiting nervously, drinking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't like the proximity here. Frumpkin's gone, out there. Then once we're in the speakeasy-- sorry, I just ate a cracker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin's under a table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Gotcha. All right. As you guys head back down, Horris is like, "I trust you guys. I trust you." You make your way down. The room is not as busy as it was last you left. There's maybe six individuals in there. Most of them are the individuals who were previously posted with rifles or new individuals also posted with rifles up at the top. There is The Gentleman, finishing a meal at the table with Sorah, his bodyguard, at the side. "Ah! I see you've made it." He sets the things down, pushes the plate to the side. "So I take it this is your contraband?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. And you would wish this smuggling to head where? Our cleanest, to be fair, our cleanest means of smuggling out would be actually through the river after you pass through, as that leads us to the northern swamps of Berleben. And that would be probably one of the safest spaces still easily able to keep him out of sight and to a safe space out of the Crownsguard's watch."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outstanding. We defer to your expertise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sound fair?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounds fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Take care of him, please." They pull the shoulders of Horris back and Horris is like, "All right. Be safe."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all right. Go with them. You'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you know what? Kara and, we'll say, Dweez. You go ahead and lead them down to the--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dweez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lead them, blindfolded of course, through the underworks to docks and send them up the way to their agreed upon task." You see Kara come back through one of the doors on the steps and behind, you see that creepy gnome from earlier sitting behind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dweez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well," and she pulls a few pieces of cloth. It looks like they're used to moving individuals through, and they have already prepared blindfolds in place. She passes them out to you and instructs you all to put on a blindfold and take a hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As soon as the blindfold is on, I'm going to pass my sight and hearing over to Frumpkin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a good call.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it works.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll hold on to Caleb to make sure he can still walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, blind woman.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, they said all hold hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Yeah. (boof)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's at the very front and who's at the very back of this chain?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stay at the front.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. Doing the best I can. Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whack) Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord front.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry! Had to get an opportunity in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's in the back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wouldn't mind having some muscle up front.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'll be behind Grog-- Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go behind Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, who's after Mollymauk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, all right. Who's after Jester?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm with Caleb in the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hold onto Caleb as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's a good order.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heh heh)."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ladder goes down for about 20 or so feet before your feet touch some sort of soft dirt, packed dirt-type feeling. The sound of the music and chatter vanishes up ahead and you hear, as soon as you all head down the ladder, a latch close and lock above you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How did my cat do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your cat managed to-- actually, make a stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, kitty! Come on, Frumpkin!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Total shit. Five!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Frumpkin's trying to trail behind, Dweez turns and goes, "(heh) No! (heh heh)" and puts a hand out and grabs Frumpkin by the scruff and holds Frumpkin up, and then throws Frumpkin back into the bar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. If I saw that, I would snap my fingers and make Frumpkin poof out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to bite my tongue and bring Frumpkin back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Dweez is clutching the back of your hand and goes, (confused sound).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just a nervous tic. I'm a nervous fellow. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (creepy laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck?! (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you head back down. You are led down a tunnel. It weaves a bit. You turn to the right, down another tunnel for 100, 200, 300 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (snaps fingers) Frumpkin back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin back in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 50 feet behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually you'll split off into two and you'll see what looks to be a small resting chamber with another set of tables and a bunk. You go past another area and there's occasional torchlight set up on parts of the wall. You can see a couple of shifty individuals that are in the process of stacking crates somewhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's other people down here doing shit as we walk by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. They'll walk by you and occasionally look. One of them will stop and inspect and move on. No one seems to fuck with you at the minute because you're with Kara. In fact, one of them seems to get close to you and looks and sees Dweez and goes (ugh) and just moves on. You do hear a noise, a strange like (guttural animal snorting) and you hear (whip crack) (animal grunting) echoing down the hall. You move around one spot and there's one archway that Frumpkin passes by, looking down, and you can see there's a pit, and there are a number of cages set up in there, about four of them, that have different creatures inside. It's too low-lit for Frumpkin to really see from this distance what's in there, but one of them is currently having a bit of a conniption fit and you see three cloaked figures that are on the outside. One of them is trying to whip elements of it that are coming at it; the other one is trying to prod it in the sides and it's getting agitated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Jester) Jester has a question. She would like to know what it smells like in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Along this river, you can see there are a few lanterns that are set up with this soft, greenish glow. They're perpetually burning in certain areas and are bolted into the rock and stone. There on the side of this dock, you can see four different boats that are currently roped and tied to the edge there. There is a figure sitting on a stool who is taking a dagger and moving it on the edge of one of the wooden poles that is on the very outside end of the dock. At this point, all of your blindfolds are removed and you've come to the end of this part of the journey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kara says, "Sorry about that, but you were respectful. Thank you." She collects the blindfolds, and Dweez, who is still clutching your hand, lets go and goes (creepy chuckle).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kara goes, "All right. Two of these ships are yours to use. You're heading up that path there about a mile or so. It's with the river, thankfully, so the stream will be carrying you through. A set of paddles to each of you. Whoever wants to helm that; that's up to you. Pay attention: from what I've been told, you'll see the change in the texture of the wall on the left-hand side traveling northward. Look for the small collapse on that end."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Collapse in the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Correct. Be spry. Sometimes some creatures do find their way living down here, so be ready to move past quickly or find a way to duck them if you can."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can take it from here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Good luck!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll be able to find your way back, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll be fine."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not good at joking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get a better look up there and you can see this wood is splintered to shit on the top. This guy has been, over time, slowly pushing away at this wood for whatever amusement he needs to pass the time down here where he's stationed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These boats look like they'll fit three to four each?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These boats look like they'll fit about four people each.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to need muscle in case we need to move fast.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get in with Nott. In the Yasha boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's piloting our boat?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha's one, and then Jester's the other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's piloting-- do you know how to drive a boat?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, we'll find out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (scared noise)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. You're so needlessly scaring me for no reason!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we have Fjord, Jester, Molly, and Beau in one boat? And Yasha and Caleb and Nott in the other? Is that how it is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I send away Frumpkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to place on my ring of water walking that I stole from Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this a boat with like, two oars?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two oars on each side, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all get in. It rocks a bit as you all adjust your weight and find a place where the boat itself isn't listing too far to one side or the other. The river current is pulling it along, so as soon as you step off, the last person holding the rope, they immediately start following the current of the river, which is not rapid, but it is moving at a fair speed. You all gather yourselves and follow it down, and as you progress, you notice those green lanterns that are lit only seem to cover the vicinity of that dock until, eventually, you are going into a pitch black cavern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On our own?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are all on our own here right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're all alone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to do your--? Read my mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (poof poof)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bring out and put on the goggles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I let two of the globules hover around the front of each boat. One at the front and one at the back of each boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as the orbs--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So romantic, you guys!

lines.name: LIAM, MATT
lines.text: (singing) There you see her!

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) There across the way!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Yah, yah, yah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) She's got a giant sword, but who cares? You've got to ask her!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Yah, yah, yah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, Beau. I pull out one of the holy water flasks. Think you know what to do with this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I do!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just in case.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put it away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who do you think the other one should go to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyone who can beat face, but doesn't have magic. Yasha, maybe? Nott?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe Nott might be safer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I do with it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not in a boat with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) What do I do with it!?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You dip your ammunition in it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This one you throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one you throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, this one is a throwing one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This isn't an oil, this is water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, never mind!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Know how to throw stuff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I've never thrown anything in my life.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there was a basket for trash and you threw it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As he's talking, I throw a gold coin at his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll a d20 and add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that's exciting!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a d20, I mean, that's a natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't count! That's cocked!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure it counts! It counts doubly as much!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to redo?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Redo. Way less!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Way less!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dexterity what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It goes right past; you hear it (splash) into the water below.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take that. So when we get into the boat together, I'm going to give you the other holy water flask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Jester) "How big is the chamber we are traveling in?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sometimes it squeezes in where it's just the river and the edges of the tunnel at about 15 feet from side to side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Jester) "With my darkvision, how high is the ceiling in here?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ceiling is roughly 15 feet as well. 15 to ten feet; sometimes it coasts down and becomes a bit lower. It is a natural river so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Jester) "I grab the edge of the boat, and I say: Oskar! Is there no echo?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (echoing) Oskar!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Jester) "That was pretty good!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys head deeper into the subterranean tunnels towards your destination, weapons at your side, prepared for whatever comes in the near future--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God damn, he's going to end the game!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to go ahead and end tonight's game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We don't have Laura here. We've had two episodes that went four plus hours. My back's hurting a little.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four more hours! Mimosas!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The people marathoning right now will be grateful to hear that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you have a holy water now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like playing a video game for 30 minutes. It's so unsatisfying!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've been here for three hours!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know it's coming. I know stuff is coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, before we get too deep into this, we'll go ahead and pick up next week when Laura can join us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feel better, Laura!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please feel better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up from there. Once again guys, thank you so much for tuning in. Check out the awesomeness of 826LA and the stuff we are doing with them. Check out Pillars of Eternity 2 and the really cool stuff that we are doing with them! And yeah, we'll be back into this next week. Until then guys, have a wonderful week, we love you, and is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!
